content: fun to make and stylish to wear this essential crochet sun hat is as easy as summer stitched in bernat softee cotton it s a simple pattern that you ll do in single_crochet and half_double_crochet techniques featuring a dramatic brim it s equally attractive whether you re wearing it with a sundress or your best denim shorts make a few in different colors to add color and style to all your outfits materials bernat® softee cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m fuchsia 69023 1 ball or 190 yds/173 m size one size to fit adult
